overview:
Trevor Stout, a serial entrepreneur and venture-backed CEO, has developed many technology industry firsts. He currently serves as CEO and founder of yap.TV, the first worldwide Social TV Guide.

As founding CEO of Internet Business Solutions, he developed Rent.Net, the first Internet apartment guide (acquired by Homestore) and Compare.net, the first product comparison search engine (acquired by MSFT).

As founding CEO of iCommerce, he pioneered web commerce technology for SMBs, deployed by large services providers including HP, Sprint and Earthlink.

As founding CEO of Jacent Technologies (sold to Yum! Brands), he built the first SaaS platform for restaurant order automation, processing more than $100m orders.

Trevor graduated from UCLA with a Bachelors of Science in CS/EE, Magna Cum Laude honors.
